EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Tom, Thanks for the update and letting met know about the broken link – I really appreciate it! In the meantime, the link it was supposed to direct you to is here - http://www.mbopartners.com/resources/all <http://www.mbopartners.com/resources/all> Take From: T Haz [mailto:trhazard50@gmail.com] Sent: Sunday, January 19, 2014 1:04 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Tom Hazard Hi Sara, looks like I will be with NPS through June. Contract work with Walter is going slow. Hopefully, leads will pick up during the Spring. I clicked on the link and receive a "page not found" error message?! thanks for checking inTom On Fri, Jan 17, 2014 at 8:42 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Hello Tom, I hope you are doing well. I wanted to touch base and see how the contract search is going? We have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here: http://www.mbopartners.com/resources <http://link.mbopartners.com/688NPM52500001T000rlt01>. In addition, if you have any suggestions for new resources that might help other consultants - please let us know! I look forward to hearing from you. Best regards,Sara Conde Consultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6028 <tel:%28703%29%20793-6028>f: 703-793-6070 <tel:703-793-6070>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://link.mbopartners.com/688NPM52500001U000rlt01>
